PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02082011-02-10,  ,  ,  ,  ,  EC,  HC
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisOrder ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 - which adds 2-Propenamide (acrylamide) and Ethanol, 2-chloro-, phosphate (3:1) (TCEP) to the List of Toxic Substances in Schedule 1 of the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0035 Publication Date: 2011-03-02
AttachmentsAttachment
